channel.title: Mono on Andrew Bancroft
channel.description: Recent content in Mono on Andrew Bancroft

item.title: Diagnosing “Restore failed” with ASP.NET 5 on Mac
item.description: Following along with Steve Smith’s “Your First ASP.NET 5 Application on a Mac”, I found myself frustrated that, despite all my efforts, the simple little sample project I was trying to get running just wouldn’t work due to a problem with restoring the project’s dependencies. Jump to… Retracing my steps Mis-matched Mono versions Resolved Was this article helpful? Please share!
